utterances.text: You also have a bunch of volunteers that are helping you distribute flyers.
How much do you heavily rely on volunteers and how helpful are they to a campaign?
Volunteers are essential to the campaign of anyone who's running for office
Every hour that a volunteer gives you is either
an hour that you don't have to spend money on or more likely
an hour of something that you otherwise wouldn't be able to do
and I can only be in so many places at once. So
the campaign honestly wouldn't have the legs that it currently has and
won't ultimately be successful other than with a very large group of dedicated volunteers.
